blog.name: gryffindor-at-3am
blog.title: Just 3AM Thoughts
blog.description: I am not funny, just insanely in love with HP. And I’m here to share all of the (incorrect) quotes that you never read in the books...

summary: “I wish I looked like a snack. I just look like I ate all the snacks.”
body:
“I wish I looked like a snack. I just look like I ate all the snacks.”

—Molly Weasley (before Arthur)

Don’t Worry Molly, you still look like a snack :)

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Non-magic AU. On a flight between London and New York, Harry ends up seated next to a very handsome man called Tom...
body:
Prompt: Non-magic AU. On a flight between London and New York, Harry ends up seated next to a very handsome man called Tom Riddle. For several hours they chat and end up getting on rather well, enough that Harry considers asking Tom out before they land.  Before he can ask for Tom’s number, the man jumps up, pulls a gun, and announces to the terrified passengers that he’s hijacking the plane.
This is bad news for Harry’s love-life, because Harry’s on the flight as an undercover air marshall, and taking down people like Tom is literally his job.

blog.name: hd-fan-fair
blog.title: H/D Fan Fair
blog.description: For 2018, we are looking for fics or artworks with Harry and Draco, featuring food-related tropes and themes!

summary: FIC: THE WAY THESE DAYS SEEM TO GO (AND GO)
title: FIC: THE WAY THESE DAYS SEEM TO GO (AND GO)
body:
Title: The Way These Days Seem to Go (And Go)
Author: Anonymous
Prompt: # 139
Food Theme: stress baking
Rating: Teen
Pairing(s): Harry/Draco, background Ron/Hermione
Warnings/Content Notes: stress baking, depression
Summary: Stress baking isn’t a hobby Harry ever thought he’d pick up, but he’s surprised to find how much it helps him to get through those long months post-war. It keeps his hands busy, it keeps his mind occupied, and it even helps him deal with how Draco Malfoy is steadily invading Harry’s life.
Word Count: 15230
Author’s Notes: Thank you as always to the mods for another year of this fantastic fest! Thank you to E for pushing me through the last of this fic with your wonderfully effective blend of encouragement and threats, and a great big huge thank you to C for jumping in to beta this thing and helping me get it into shape, you are amazing. Title from Alkaline Trio’s “Worn So Thin.”

( The Way These Days Seem to Go (And Go) )

blog.name: hd-fan-fair
blog.title: H/D Fan Fair
blog.description: For 2018, we are looking for fics or artworks with Harry and Draco, featuring food-related tropes and themes!

title: FIC: POPULAR APPETITE
body:
Title: Popular Appetite
Author: Anonymous
Prompt: # 48
Food Theme: Upscale resort French food and Cornish food
Rating: PG
Pairing(s): Draco/Harry, background Ron/Hermione
Warnings/Content Notes: None
Summary: Bad press is destroying Draco’s hotel. There is only one person who can create enough good press to save it.
Word Count: 16735
Author’s Notes: Huge thanks to digthewriter for correcting all my errors and providing great advice. If there are mistakes, it’s because I kept playing with it.

momatu, thank you for such an inspiring prompt! I wanted to get even more food into this story, but I hope you will enjoy what I managed.

The title is a reference to Oscar Wilde discussing the press in his 1891 pamphlet, “The soul of man under socialism.” He discusses journalists who sell scandals from people’s private lives to satisfy “the gross popular appetite.” In this story, Draco is fodder for the public’s appetite for gossip, but he is trying to satisfy a different popular appetite.

( Popular Appetite )
